content: Business and educational environments widely used Lotus 1-2-3 during the late 1980s and 1990s. The WK5 format allowed users to save complex worksheets with formulas that automatically perform calculations, as well as charts or other structured data. Users could also reuse these files to maintain records over time or share data with colleagues.

description: A WK5 file is a spreadsheet created by version 5 of IBM Lotus 1-2-3, a discontinued spreadsheet program. It stores information in a grid of rows and columns, including numbers, text, and formulas. WK5 spreadsheets are used in various tasks, such as budgeting, accounting, and general data management.

instructions: You can open WK5 files with IBM Lotus 1-2-3. However, the program is discontinued.
